sourcesContent:
LOGIN MARIA

  • Invalid Username

    The Username must be longer than {{loginForm.get('username')?.errors?.['minlength'].requiredLength}} characters

    The Username is so long, try with {{loginForm.get('username')?.errors?.['maxlength'].requiredLength}} characters

    Invalid username

    You can't use special characters like (#, &, ?, @,)

  • Verify your password

  • Did you forget your username or password?
    ¡click here!

Don't have an account on the app Maria?
